goals__remit: Hindu Forum of Europe is a European Platforme for the over 2 million Hindus in Europe. It strives to represent the interests and concerns of the different Hindu Communities throughout Europe to the EU Institutions. It also tries to create more awareness amongst European policy makers, media, religious communities, etc about the Hindu Communities and the ethos, values and principles that Hinduism stands for.
